content.content: Forum at a Glance! The one-stop-shop for finding out what’s being discussed by governance right now. Links reflect my view of the most noteworthy activity in the governance, risk, and oracles categories right now. Disagree? Think something should be added? Leave a reply or a pm.  Three-Point Summary ‘What do I need to know as an MKR Holder this week?’  The bulls are out in force with MKR price hitting an ATH above 3,300 DAI   ETH-A usage currently sitting just above 1.75B DAI, closing in on the first vault type to pass 100M DAI in annualized stability fees. DAI peg is stronger than ever, with DAI Deschipher reporting a 7-day VWAP of $1.0!  1884×653 33.1 KB      ICYMI - Announcements Oh yeah, that happened!   Announcing MakerDAO’s Community Blog!  @mrabino1 shared the 6s - RWA001-A - Document Roadmap take a look at all the awesome work being done to onboard Real-World Assets!    Active Discussions  ‘What’s going on? You think what?! You’re 100% wrong, and here’s why…’ [Discussion] Activating MKR Staking Rewards - @hexonaut breaks out the diagrams on how much Staking Rewards could pay MKR holders who lock their tokens in  Governance. A Series of Questions About Strategy - @seth asks some important questions about the future growth of DAI and the Maker protocol. [Informal Poll] - Increasing the SourceCred payments - @mrabino1 asks the community how they would feel about increasing payments to contributors via SourceCred.   Seeking Consensus  ‘Yo, do you even signal?’ [Signal Request] Adjust Liquidation Ratio for UNI-V2-DAI-USDC-A Vault Type - @monet-supply signals lowering the liquidation ratio for UNI-V2-DAI-USDC-A to encourage more participation in the pair.   Ongoing Initiatives  ‘Oh my god, this is taking ages, why can’t things be simple?’  Collateral Calls - Calling all Projects!  @juan sets up a signup thread for projects wishing to present on the bi-weekly collateral call. Know any potential collateral partners that want to present? Refer them here. Collateral Status Index - Confused about the current status of the various collateral types that have been discussed recently? Check out this post to find out the status and current position of each within the onboarding process. Weekly MIPs Updates - @Davidutro and @charlesstlouis bring the latest updates in the world of MIPs. MakerDAO Standard Governance Processes - @LongForWisdom writes a brief overview of the currently operating governance processes in the Maker community. Confused between Signals, Declarations, and MIPs? Look no further. The Official Welcome Thread - A welcome and introductions thread. Not strictly speaking governance, but if anyone new or old wants to introduce themselves, now is your chance!   Help Wanted  ‘Oh %#$?, we need a doodad, and we need it now.’ Wanted: Risk Domain Monitoring Tools  - @Primoz puts out a call for additional support to produce monitoring tools for the risk team. Grants are available. Wanted: Join the Summary Team - @Davidutro asks for anyone interested in producing call summaries to get in touch. Grants available. We could always use help reviewing MIPs in the Request for Comment phase
This topic was automatically closed 7 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.

Forum at a Glance! The one stop shop for finding out what’s being discussed by governance right now. Links reflect my view of the most noteworthy activity in the governance, risk and oracles categories right now. Disagree? Think something should be added? Leave a reply or a pm.  Three Point Summary ‘What do I need to know as an MKR Holder this week?’   “Holy liquidations Batman!” April 28th saw over $15M of ETH effectively liquidated from ETH-B, ironically right before ETH hit an ATH. Liquidations revenue kick-started the burner, with over 300 MKR burned in 24 hours   The peg remains strong, with ETH volatility  likely to blame for a slight VWAP increase of DAI to $1.002  1877×513 206 KB      ICYMI - Announcements Oh yeah, that happened!  It’s the end of an era with the announcement that @Davidutro is Retiring the Community Call. Make sure to check out the MIP45 Audit Summary if you haven’t had the chance yet!    Active Discussions  ‘What’s going on? You think what?! You’re 100% wrong, and here’s why…’ Debt floor and smallholder consequences - @jumnhy 's first post to the forum asks about the state of the Debt Floor (dust) and what the community can be doing for small account holders. Who do I call, if I want to call MakerDao? - @purrfection harks back to international politics and wonders how the DAO can effectively communicate with outside groups.   Seeking Consensus  ‘Yo, do you even signal?’ [Signal Request] - Increase the DSR - New! - @mrabino1 signals for an increase to the DAI Savings Rate, with multiple options for a “temperature check” of the community’s commitment to a positive DSR. [Signal Request] Adjust KNC-A Debt Ceiling - New! - @monet-supply signals for action on KYC-A, following an announcement that KyberDAO will be moving to a new token.   Ongoing Initiatives  ‘Oh my god, this is taking ages, why can’t things be simple?’  Collateral Calls - Calling all Projects!  @juan sets up a signup thread for projects wishing to present on the bi-weekly collateral call. Know any potential collateral partners that want to present? Refer them here. Collateral Status Index - Confused about the current status of the various collateral types that have been discussed recently? Check out this post to find out the status and current position of each within the onboarding process. Weekly MIPs Updates - @Davidutro and @charlesstlouis bring the latest updates in the world of MIPs. MakerDAO Standard Governance Processes - @LongForWisdom writes a brief overview of the currently operating governance processes in the Maker community. Confused between Signals, Declarations and MIPs? Look no further. The Official Welcome Thread - A welcome and introductions thread. Not strictly speaking governance, but if anyone new or old wants to introduce themselves, now is your chance!   Help Wanted  ‘Oh %#$?, we need a doodad, and we need it now.’ Wanted: Risk Domain Monitoring Tools  - @Primoz puts out a call for additional support to produce monitoring tools for the risk team. Grants are available. Wanted: Join the Summary Team - @Davidutro asks for anyone interested in producing call summaries get in touch. Grants available. We could always use help reviewing MIPs in the Request for Comment phase
When Rocket Chat at-a-glance? That’s were the hustlers post the alpha
This topic was automatically closed 14 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.

Forum at a Glance! The one stop shop for finding out what’s being discussed by governance right now. Links reflect my view of the most noteworthy activities in the governance, risk and oracles categories right now. Disagree? Think something should be added? Leave a reply or a pm. Three Point Summary ‘What do I need to know as an MKR Holder this week?’ We’re firing on all cylinders  The protocol reached a new ATH of Total Value Locked this week: $8.2B  DAI supply rose to $3.17B  The System Surplus is now at $22M    ICYMI - Announcements   Following the call last week, members of the MKR Compensation Working Group will soon be selected. Apply here:  Community Member Holding no/little MKR Large MKR Holder Representative 3rd Party Representative Proposed Core Units Representative Current Core Units Representative     Active Discussions ‘What’s going on? You think what?! You’re 100% wrong, and here’s why…’ [Discussion] Direct deposit DAI module (D3M) - New @ethwarrior and the Aave team bring forward a discussion on utilising the D3M (as per MIP50) on Aave to expand DAI’s Layer 2 reach and provide the DAO with a new revenue stream. [Discussion] Maker and the (de)central bank meme - New @prose11 talks about Maker the brand and a potential DAO2DAO future. [Informal Poll] Should We Raise the Minimum MKR Needed to Call End.Cage for Emergency Shutdown? - New @flipflopflapdelegate discusses raising the MKR requirement to initiate an Emergency Shutdown. [Informal Poll] Discord chat - Ongoing @iammeeoh  proposes launching a MakerDAO Discord channel.  Ongoing Initiatives ‘Oh my god, this is taking ages, why can’t things be simple?’  Collateral Calls - Calling all Projects!  @juan sets up a signup thread for projects wishing to present on the bi-weekly collateral call. Know any potential collateral partners that want to present? Refer them here. Collateral Status Index - Confused about the current status of the various collateral types that have been discussed recently? Check out this post to find out the status and current position of each within the onboarding process. Weekly MIPs Updates - @Davidutro and @charlesstlouis bring the latest updates in the world of MIPs. MakerDAO Standard Governance Processes - @LongForWisdom writes a brief overview of the currently operating governance processes in the Maker community. Confused between Signals, Declarations and MIPs? Look no further. The Official Welcome Thread - A welcome and introductions thread. Not strictly speaking governance, but if anyone new or old wants to introduce themselves, now is your chance!  Help Wanted ‘Oh %#$?, we need a doodad, and we need it now.’ Wanted: Risk Domain Monitoring Tools  - @Primoz puts out a call for additional support to produce monitoring tools for the risk team. Grants are available. Wanted: Join the Summary Team - @Davidutro asks for anyone interested in producing call summaries get in touch. Grants available. We could always use help reviewing MIPs in the Request for Comment phase

Forum at a Glance! The one stop shop for finding out what’s being discussed by governance right now. Links reflect my view of the most noteworthy activities in the governance, risk and oracles categories right now. Disagree? Think something should be added? Leave a reply or a pm.  Three Point Summary ‘What do I need to know as an MKR Holder this week?’  MKR price hit an all-time high today: $4878  System Surplus Buffer is steadily filling up, now sitting at 26.7MM  Total DAI supply is also growing, currently at 3.6B     ICYMI - Announcements  The Liquidations 2.0 upgrade is now voted in. Check out this blog post to see what this means for MakerDAO and the community. In another post, @Kurt_Barry and the Smart Contracts Team go into detail regarding reasons for the recent Executive Vote delay.    Active Discussions  ‘What’s going on? You think what?! You’re 100% wrong, and here’s why…’ Real-World Assets - Strategy for 2021 - New - With the first Real-World Asset operational (New Silver), the RWA team discusses strategy for 2021. Liquidations 2.0 Auction Duration Tradeoffs - New - @Primoz presents an analysis of possible scenarios resulting from different Liquidations 2.0 auction durations. [RISK] What If… A Powerful Intelligence Agency Attacked The Emergency Shutdown - New - @flipflopflapdelegate starts a discussion on various Emergency Shutdown attack vectors.   Seeking Consensus  ‘Yo, do you even signal?’[Signal Request] PAX vault DC change [Signal Request] PAX vault DC change - New - @alexis is looking to adjust the PAX stablecoin’s Debt Ceiling. [Signal Request] Adjust Liquidation Ratio for UNI-V2-DAI-USDC-A Vault Type - New - @monet-supply is seeking consensus on reducing the Liquidation Ratio on the UNI-V2-DAI-USDC-A Vault.   Ongoing Initiatives  ‘Oh my god, this is taking ages, why can’t things be simple?’  Collateral Calls - Calling all Projects!  @juan sets up a signup thread for projects wishing to present on the bi-weekly collateral call. Know any potential collateral partners that want to present? Refer them here. Check out this post to find out the status and current position of each within the onboarding process.
